labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Windows 10 Home Fall Creators Update x64
data.actual_result: invite sends if you're the one who blocked the user, doesn't if they blocked you
data.expected_result: Nothing sends, because the user is blocked
data.short_description: The "Invite Your Friends" modal lets u send a dm to a blocked user note: not everyone has the new modal
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message to a user, then block them - Make a new server - allow modal to appear - hit invite - go to dm's with that user
